title: Hong Kong Bans Flights From U.S., U.K., Six Other Nations
content:
1. Hong Kong Bans Flights From U.S., U.K., Six Other Nations  Bloomberg
  2. Hong Kong bans some inbound flights, tightens COVID-19 curbs  Reuters
  3. Omicron: Hong Kong Scraps Flights, Shuts Bars and Gyms in Covid Zero Policy  Bloomberg Quicktake: Now
  4. Live news: Hong Kong to ban passenger flights from US, UK and Australia  Financial Times
  5. Hong Kong leader announces new COVID measures, including flight bans  Reuters
